title: Vegetarian Sweet and Sour Meatballs
ingredients: ['1 bag Quorn vegetarian meatballs', '1 large onion', '1 small red pepper', '1 carrot', '2 serves rcooked rice or asian noodles (your choice)', '1 tablespoon brown sugar', '2 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '1 tablespoon soy sauce', '1 tablespoon gin', '3 tablespoons tomato ketchup', '1 small tin pineapple pieces in juice', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '1 clove garlic']
